page.syntax: C Result = rsToJSON(rs as SQL::ResultSet [,startRow as N [,rows as N [,flagForceObjectNamesToUppercase as L [,forceToChar as L [,dateTimeFormat as C [,dateFormat as C]]]]]])

argument.name: forceToChar
argument.description: (optional) If .T. (default) single-quote numeric and logical values

argument.name: dateTimeFormat
argument.description: (optional) Format string for dateTime values, as used by the time Function, e.g. "yyyy-MM-dd"

argument.name: dateFormat
argument.description: (optional) Format string for date values, as used by the time Function

page.description: Takes an AlphaDAO resultset and converts the data to a JSON object.
page.example: dim cn as sql::connection cn.Open("::Name::Northwind") cn.Execute("select * from orders") rs=cn.ResultSet txt=rsToJSON(rs, -1, 10) showvar(txt)
